Welcome to SUB!

Greetings and welcome to SUBmission platform! You are receiving this e-mail because you just registered your account with us. Now you can build dynamic forms to collect, store and manage user data with ease. SUB is a great in-house alternative to WuFoo or Google Forms, with an active development team and a growing list of features.

Cheers,
The SUB team
